## RouterOptions.linkActiveClass property

Default class applied to active [RouterLink](./reactivuety.routerlink.md)<!-- -->. If none is provided, `router-link-active` will be applied.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
linkActiveClass?: string;
```
